speciesType.name: Bi cells
speciesType.notes: Intermediate state of B cells (result of antigen recognition by naïve B cells)

speciesType.name: Ba cells
speciesType.notes: “Licensed” B cells (intermediate state of B cells activated by Th1 cells via CD40L-CD40 interaction)

speciesType.name: mDC1 cells
speciesType.notes: Mature dendritic cells type 1 (result of antigen recognition by immature dendritic cells)

speciesType.name: mDC1a cells
speciesType.notes: "Licensed" mature dendritic cells (mature dendritic cells of type 1 activated by Th1 cells via CD40L-CD40 interaction)

compartment.name: Blood
compartment.notes: The fluid that circulates in the principal vascular system of human beings and other vertebrates, in humans consisting of plasma in which the red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets are suspended.

compartment.name: Lymph node
compartment.notes: Tissue-draining (sentinel) lymph node. A lymph node is an oval-shaped organ of the lymphatic system, distributed widely throughout the body including the armpit and stomach and linked by lymphatic vessels.

compartment.name: Tissue
compartment.notes: Inflammed tissue in human body (for example, tumor tissue, liver, lungs, skin, kidney etc.)

compartment.name: Blood plasma
compartment.notes: The pale yellow fluid portion of whole blood that consists of water and its dissolved constituents including proteins (as albumin, fibrinogen, and globulins), electrolytes, sugars, etc.

species.name: Th0 in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of Th0 cells in lymph node.

species.name: Th2 in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of Th2 cells in lymph node.

species.name: Th2 in blood
species.notes: Concentration of Th2 cells in blood.

species.name: Th2 in tissue
species.notes: Concentration of Th2 cells in tissue.

species.name: Bi in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of intermediate activated B cells (after antigen recognition) in lymph node

species.name: Ba in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of “licensed” B cells (Bi activated by Th1 via CD40L-CD40 interaction) in lymph node

species.name: mDC1 in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of mature DC1 (after antigen recognition) in lymph node

species.name: mDC1a in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of "licensed" (activated by Th1 via CD40L-CD40 interaction) mature DC activated in lymph node

species.name: MHC class II in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of MHC class II on mDC1, mDC1a, Bi and Ba cells surface in lymph node

species.name: CD80/86 (on mDC1, mDC1a, Bi and Ba) in lymph node
species.notes: Concentration of CD80/86 on mDC1, mDC1a, Bi and Ba cells surface in lymph node

species.name: CTLA-4 (on Th0 cells) in lymph node
species.notes: Total concentration of CTLA4 on Th0 cells surface in lymph node

parameter.notes: Lymph flow rate.
Emax of CTLA4 effect on Th0 cells differentiation into Th1 or Th2 or Th17 or Treg.
EC50 of CTLA4 effect on Th0 cells differentiation into Th1 or Th2 or Th17 or Treg.
Constant describing CTLA4 level on surface of 10^3 Th0 cells.

Constant describing the effect of CD28 ligands on Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells (merged with parameter describing expression of CD28 per cell). The value is assumed to be the same as for Th1 cells.
Rate constant of Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells.
Constant describing the effect of IL-4 on Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells.
Rate constant of Th2 cells apoptosis in LN.
Rate constant of Th2 cells proliferation. The value is assumed to be the same as for Th1 cells.
Emax of TGFb effect on Th2 cells proliferation.
EC50 of TGFb effect on Th2 cells proliferation.
Constant describing the effect of IL-2 on Th2 cells proliferation. The value is assumed to be the same as for Th1 cells.
Rate constant of Th2 cells apoptosis in blood.
Rate constant of Th2 cells migration from blood to tissue.
Rate constant of Th2 cells apoptosis in tissue.
Constant describing MHC class II level on surface of 10^3 Bi cells.
Constant describing MHC class II level on surface of 10^3 Ba cells.
Constant describing CD80/86 level on surface of 10^3 Bi cells.
Constant describing CD80/86 level on surface of 10^3 Ba cells.
Constant describing MHC class II level on surface of 10^3 mDC1.
Constant describing MHC class II level on surface of 10^3 mDC1a.
Constant describing CD80/86 level on surface of 10^3 mDC1.
Constant describing CD80/86 level on surface of 10^3 mDC1a.
Rate constant of IL-10 synthesis by Th2 cells.
Rate constant of IL-4 synthesis by Th2 cells.
Rate constant of IL-4 synthesis by other cells.
Rate constant of IL-4 degradation.
Rate constant of IL-5 synthesis by Th2 cells .
Rate constant of IL-5 synthesis by other cells.
Rate constant of IL-5 degradation.
Rate constant of IL-13 synthesis by Th2 cells.
Inhibitory effect of CTLA4 on Th0 cells differentiation into Th1/Th2/Th17/Treg cells
Stimulatory effect of IL-4 on Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells
Stimulatory effect of CD28 ligands on Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells
Inhibitory effect of TGFb on Th2 cells proliferation

reaction.name: Differentiation of Th0 cells into Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: APC induces differentiation of Th0 into Th2 by stimulation of CD3 (TCR) and CD28 (co-stimulatory molecule). IL-4 stimulates this process. Co-inhibitory molecules such as CTLA-4 (presented on surface of CD8 T cells and competing with CD28 for CD80/86), PD-1 (presented on surface of CD8 T cells and interacting with PD-L1) and PD-L1 (presented on surface of antigen presenting cells and interacting with PD-1) inhibit Th0 cells differentiation into Th2 cells.

reaction.name: Apoptosis of Th2 cells in lymph node
Proliferation of Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to proliferate. IL-2 stimulates and TGFb inhibits Th2 cells proliferation.

reaction.name: Migration of Th2 cells from lymph node to blood
reaction.notes: Cells leave lymph node via the efferent lymphatics.

reaction.name: Apoptosis of Th2 cells in blood
Migration of Th2 cells from blood to tissue
reaction.notes: Th2 are able to migrate to inflamed tissue due to the presence of specific molecules on activated T cells surface.

reaction.name: Apoptosis of Th2 cells in tissue
Migration of Th2 cells from tissue to lymph node
reaction.notes: Cells migrate from inflammed tissue to lymph node via the afferent lymphatics.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-10 by Th2 cells in blood
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-10.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-10 by Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-10.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-10 by Th2 cells in tissue
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-10.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-4 by Th2 cells in blood
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-4.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-4 by Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-4.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-4 by Th2 cells in tissue
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-4.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-4 by other cells
reaction.notes: Production of IL-4 by cells that are not included in IRT.

reaction.name: Degradation of IL-4
Synthesis of IL-5 by Th2 cells in blood
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-5.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-5 by Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-5.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-5 by Th2 cells in tissue
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-5.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-5 by other cells
reaction.notes: Production of IL-5 by cells that are not included in IRT.

reaction.name: Degradation of IL-5
Synthesis of IL-13 by Th2 cells in blood
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-13.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-13 by Th2 cells in lymph node
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-13.

reaction.name: Synthesis of IL-13 by Th2 cells in tissue
reaction.notes: Th2 cells are able to produce IL-13.
